text: Apani balunah tini'i saktimana ye, tomadera upara kona sasti upara dika theke athaba tomadera padatala theke prerana karabena athaba tomaderake dale-upadale bibhakta kare saba'ike mukhomukhi kare dibena ebam ekake an'yera upara akramanera sbada asbadana karabena. Dekha, ami kemana ghuriye-phiriye nidarsanabali barnana kari yate tara bujhe neya.
